memberdef.name: IS_FUNCTION
memberdef.initializer: !cb.IsUndefined() && cb.IsFunction()

memberdef.name: REQUIRE_ARGUMENTS
memberdef.initializer: if (info.Length() < (n)) { \ Napi::TypeError::New(env, "Expected " #n "arguments").ThrowAsJavaScriptException(); \ return env.Null(); \ }

memberdef.name: REQUIRE_ARGUMENT_EXTERNAL
REQUIRE_ARGUMENT_FUNCTION
REQUIRE_ARGUMENT_STRING
REQUIRE_ARGUMENT_INTEGER
OPTIONAL_ARGUMENT_FUNCTION
memberdef.initializer: Napi::Function var; \ if (info.Length() > i && !info[i].IsUndefined()) { \ if (!info[i].IsFunction()) { \ Napi::TypeError::New(env, "Argument " #i " must be a function").ThrowAsJavaScriptException(); \ return env.Null(); \ } \ var = info[i].As<Napi::Function>(); \ }

memberdef.name: OPTIONAL_ARGUMENT_INTEGER
DEFINE_CONSTANT_INTEGER
memberdef.initializer: Napi::PropertyDescriptor::Value(#name, Napi::Number::New(env, constant), \ static_cast<napi_property_attributes>(napi_enumerable | napi_configurable)),

memberdef.name: DEFINE_CONSTANT_STRING
memberdef.initializer: Napi::PropertyDescriptor::Value(#name, Napi::String::New(env, constant), \ static_cast<napi_property_attributes>(napi_enumerable | napi_configurable)),

memberdef.name: EXCEPTION
EMIT_EVENT
TRY_CATCH_CALL
memberdef.initializer: Napi::Value* passed_argv = argv;\ std::vector<napi_value> args;\ if ((argc != 0) && (passed_argv != NULL)) {\ args.assign(passed_argv, passed_argv + argc);\ }\ Napi::Value res = (callback).Call(Napi::Value(context), args); \ if (res.IsEmpty()) return __VA_ARGS__;

memberdef.name: WORK_DEFINITION
memberdef.initializer: Napi::Value name(const Napi::CallbackInfo& info); \ static void Work_Begin##name(Baton* baton); \ static void Work_##name(napi_env env, void* data); \ static void Work_After##name(napi_env env, napi_status status, void* data);

memberdef.name: ASSERT_STATUS
memberdef.initializer: (void)status;

memberdef.name: CREATE_WORK
memberdef.initializer: int status = napi_create_async_work(env, NULL, Napi::String::New(env, name),\ workerFn, afterFn, baton, &baton->request); \ \ ASSERT_STATUS(); \ napi_queue_async_work(env, baton->request);

memberdef.name: STATEMENT_BEGIN
memberdef.initializer: assert(baton); \ assert(baton->stmt); \ assert(!baton->stmt->locked); \ assert(!baton->stmt->finalized); \ assert(baton->stmt->prepared); \ baton->stmt->locked = true; \ baton->stmt->db->pending++; \ auto env = baton->stmt->Env(); \ CREATE_WORK("sqlite3.Statement."#type, Work_##type, Work_After##type);

memberdef.name: STATEMENT_INIT
memberdef.initializer: type* baton = static_cast<type*>(data); \ Statement* stmt = baton->stmt;

memberdef.name: STATEMENT_MUTEX
STATEMENT_END
memberdef.initializer: assert(stmt->locked); \ assert(stmt->db->pending); \ stmt->locked = false; \ stmt->db->pending--; \ stmt->Process(); \ stmt->db->Process();

memberdef.name: BACKUP_BEGIN
memberdef.initializer: assert(baton); \ assert(baton->backup); \ assert(!baton->backup->locked); \ assert(!baton->backup->finished); \ assert(baton->backup->inited); \ baton->backup->locked = true; \ baton->backup->db->pending++; \ auto env = baton->backup->Env(); \ CREATE_WORK("sqlite3.Backup."#type, Work_##type, Work_After##type);

memberdef.name: BACKUP_INIT
memberdef.initializer: type* baton = static_cast<type*>(data); \ Backup* backup = baton->backup;

memberdef.name: BACKUP_END
memberdef.initializer: assert(backup->locked); \ assert(backup->db->pending); \ backup->locked = false; \ backup->db->pending--; \ backup->Process(); \ backup->db->Process();
